hours_text:
#  Tickets & Hours 

### PRICING & Location

Adults: $12

Seniors (60+), Active Military & Veterans, Healthcare Workers & Students: $10

Catalina Island Residents (proof of residency required): $7.50

Golden State Advantage cardholder (two adults and their children under 18 years): Free

Children (15 years & under with paid adult ticket): Free

[Buy Tickets](https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/catalinamuseum/?full-items=yes)

### Museum Hours

10 a.m. to 5 p.m. (PST)

Extended Hours (10 a.m. to 6 p.m.) Fridays and Saturdays, June - Labor Day weekend. (Hours may vary based on other museum events during those months.)

Closed Mondays: September (after Labor Day) through May; Open 7 Days: June - Labor Day

Holidays: Closed New Year's Day, July 4th, Thanksgiving and Christmas Day

### Location

217 Metropole Avenue, Avalon, CA 90704

### Safety Protocols

Our indoor galleries, digital theater, outdoor plazas and Museum Store are open. 

Face masks are optional for all visitors. We are continuing our enhanced safety measures which include increased frequency of cleaning services and disinfecting all high-touch surfaces and added hand sanitizing stations.

**Whether you are vaccinated or not, if you do not feel well and/or have any COVID-19 related symptoms please postpone your visit to another day. Symptoms include, but are not limited to: cough, fever, loss of taste or smell, and shortness of breath.**

accessibility_text:
#  Calendar 

## First Friday in April: Mixology at the Museum with Adam Wild

Join Us for First Friday in April: Mixology at the Museum with Adam Wild!

Experience a unique happy hour at the museum with extended hours and no admission fee from 5 to 7 pm. Enjoy our galleries, digital theater, open-air plazas, and a late-night visit to the Museum Store.

Adam Wild will captivate you with his specialty cocktails, and you can also purchase wine, beer, and other refreshments.

Don't miss this gathering; it's the perfect way to unwind and explore the museum!

Please register in advance so we can ensure a great experience for everyone. Thank you!

### Date & Time

April 3, 2026 @ 5:00 PM - 6:00 PM 

### Location

217 Metropole Ave, Avalon, CA 90704 [View Map](https://maps.google.com/?q=Catalina Museum for Art & History+217+Metropole+Ave%2c+Avalon%2c+CA+90704)

### Contact Information

Name: Kellie Costello

Phone: [310-510-4650](tel:310-510-4650)

Email: [kcostello@catalinamuseum.org](mailto:kcostello@catalinamuseum.org)

### More Details

[Buy Tickets Here](https://secure.qgiv.com/for/pbi8fp/event/april2026firstfriday/)

collections_text:
"Catalina Clay" delves into the artistry of the Catalina Clay Products Company, showcasing stunning ceramics crafted between the 1920s and 1940s.

[Learn More](https://www.catalinamuseum.org/whats-happening/all+exhibits/catalina-clay-unveiling-the-islands-artistic-heritage)
